body: This is the moment you realize there is another episode and another season. This is when you reach for your cup of coffee and it is more than halfway full and is still warm. This is the time you throw something at the trashcan across the room and it lands inside it perfectly. This has better art than 90% of the anime I've watched and hentai I've fapped to (an I've seen alot and have developed a very picky taste of the best of the best) This is that time something fits and sits into something else it wasn't made for but fits perfectly into anyways. This is that time you sit outside in a cold morning to smoke and the sun just sizzles you and makes you feel warm. I have no words even all that just fails to grasp how good this is; this is this, this is art.
I don't know what to say to express how good this art is.
